backOff.description: Backoff is the backoff policy to be applied per retry attempt. gateway uses a fully jittered exponential back-off algorithm for retries. For additional details, see https://www.envoyproxy.io/docs/envoy/latest/configuration/http/http_filters/router_filter#config-http-filters-router-x-envoy-max-retries

timeout.description: Timeout is the timeout per retry attempt.
